content.text: Match ends, West Ham United 1, Chelsea 0.
Second Half ends, West Ham United 1, Chelsea 0.
Attempt missed. Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high.
Arthur Masuaku (West Ham United) is shown the yellow card.
Attempt missed. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Álvaro Morata.
Andreas Christensen (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Diafra Sakho (West Ham United).
Attempt missed. Álvaro Morata (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left.
Offside, West Ham United. Winston Reid tries a through ball, but Diafra Sakho is caught offside.
Mark Noble (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Willian (Chelsea).
Substitution, West Ham United. André Ayew replaces Michail Antonio because of an injury.
